titles.title: Future Interstate in Oklahoma and Arkansas Act
A bill to amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to designate United States Route 412 as a future part of the Interstate System, and for other purposes.
Future Interstate in Oklahoma and Arkansas Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Future Interstate in Oklahoma and Arkansas Act
This bill designates the route that generally follows U.S. Route 412 from its intersection with Interstate 35 in Noble County, Oklahoma, passing through Tulsa, Oklahoma, to its intersection with Interstate 49 in Springdale, Arkansas, as (1) a high priority corridor on the National Highway System; (2) a future part of the Interstate System; and (3) a segment of highway, if designated as a route on the Interstate System, that permits the continued operation of vehicles without regard to vehicle weight limitation requirements.
